semantic-approvedrevs-property-approved-: "$1" identifies the revision ID of a page that has been approved and is provided by the [https://www.semantic-mediawiki.org/wiki/Extension:Semantic_Approved_Revs Semantic Approved Revs] extension.
"$1" identifies the user who set the approval status of the page and is provided by the [https://www.semantic-mediawiki.org/wiki/Extension:Semantic_Approved_Revs Semantic Approved Revs] extension.

"$1" identifies the time when the approval status of the page was set and is provided by the [https://www.semantic-mediawiki.org/wiki/Extension:Semantic_Approved_Revs Semantic Approved Revs] extension.
"$1" identifies the approval status of a page and is provided by the [https://www.semantic-mediawiki.org/wiki/Extension:Semantic_Approved_Revs Semantic Approved Revs] extension.
